titleStmt.title: Cenotaphium Iacobi. Sive Laudatio funebris piæ et foelici memoriæ serenissimi potentissimique Iacobi Magnæ Britanniæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ monarchæ dedicata, & publicè recitata à Iohanne King Academiæ Oxoniensis oratore
titleStmt.author: King, John, 1594 or 5-1639.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
